document.full_text: finance ministers of china, japan and south korea are mindful of the challenges from inflation, rising commodity prices and the increasing volatility of capital flows to the region, a draft statement seen on tuesday ahead of a trilateral meeting showed.
document.title: china, japan, south korea wary of inflation risk: draft
lines_and_colors: finance ministers of china, japan and south korea are mindful of the challenges from inflation, rising commodity prices and the increasing volatility of capital flows to the region, a draft statement seen on tuesday ahead of a trilateral meeting showed.
